snippet: Tension is building over a shake-up at the University of Virginia that faculty leaders have asked the governing board to reconsider.
abstract: University of Virginia's governing board agrees to meet with a faculty delegation to discuss its abrupt ouster of Teresa A Sullivan, the university president, who resigned after just two years in her post.
lead_paragraph: Tension is building over a shake-up at the University of Virginia that faculty leaders have asked the governing board to reconsider.

headline.seo: Tension Builds Over Ouster of University of Virginia President
headline.main: Board to Meet With Faculty Over Ouster of President
headline.print_headline: Board to Meet With Faculty Over Ouster Of President
